name: 黃國修
objective: 一維及多維穩定態熱傳導及非穩定態熱傳導、對流原理、強迫對流及自然對流經驗和實驗關係式、輻射熱傳遞、凝結與沸騰、熱交換器、熱傳遞中的特殊論題
schedule:
1. Introduction (2週)
2. Fundamentals of Conduction (1週)
3. 1-D, 2-D Steady-State Conduction (2週)
4. Transient Conduction (2週)
5. Fundamentals of Convection (1週)
6. External Flow Convection (2週)
7. Internal Flow Convection (2週)
8. Free Convection (2週)
9. Radiation (3週)
scorePolicy:
Take-home exams: 5% X 17 = 85%
課堂表現： 15％
materials: Fundamentals of Heat and Mass Transfer, Frank Incropera & David DeWitt
